long_description: Ensure the comfort of your discerning young passenger with the Weehoo All Weather Canopy. It attaches to your Weehoo iGo bike trailer to protect your child from the weather. Weehoo All Weather Canopy is compatible with all iGo bike trailer models, sold separately. Front flap wraps up and out of the way for outstanding visibility during great weather. Tinted to help reduce sun glare.
short_description: Ensure the comfort of your discerning young passenger with the Weehoo All Weather Canopy. It attaches to your Weehoo iGo bike trailer to protect your child from the weather.
